Provides home support services for people requiring assistance in their own homes, available both privately and for the local authority. Offers personal care, befriending, pension collection, support with medication, cleaning, shopping service, help with social outings and visits to the hospital. Can organise visits from the hairdresser or the chiropodist. Operates mainly in the North of Sheffield. Inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC) to ensure a quality service is provided.
Can give advice and information on Direct Payments.
